D1e1s1c1e1n1d1i1n1g1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1p1l1a1n1e1t1 1s1e1v1e1r1e1l1y1 1l1a1c1k1i1n1g1 1f1r1e2d1o1m1,1 1w1e1 1s1t1i1l2 1a1r1e1 1a1s2u1r1i1n1g1 1o1u1r1s1e1l1v1e1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1w1e1 1o1w1n1e1d1 1m1o1r1e1 1o1f1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1t1h1a1n1 1a1n1y1 1o1t1h1e1r1.1
2M1a1r1k1 1W1.1 1M1o1f2e1t2,1 1a1 1z1o2l1o1g1i1s1t1 1z1e1r1o1i1n1g1 1i1n1 1s1o1c1i1a1l1 1g1r1o1u1p1s1 1(1i1n1c1l1u1d1i1n1g1 1h1u1m1a1n1s1'1)1,1 1a1s2e1r1t1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1e1v1e1n1 1A1f1g1h1a1n1s1 1m1u1s1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e2n1 1w1i1d1e1-1e1y1e1d1l1y1 1p1u1r1p1o1r1t1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1y1 1w1e1r1e1 1s1a1v1o1r1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1'1s1t1a1t1e1-1g1r1a1n1t1e1d1 1f1r1e2d1o1m1s1'1,1 1g1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1s1u1c1h1 1'1f1r1e2d1o1m1s1'1 1w1e1r1e1 1s1o1m1e1w1h1a1t1 1e1c2e1n1t1r1i1c1 1t1o1 1A1m1e1r1i1c1a1n1s1 1[1a1n1d1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1e1l1s1e1w1h1e1r1e1]1.1
2T1h1i1s1 1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1 1i1s1 1a1l1s1o1 1c1r1e2p1i1n1g1 1u1p1o1n1 1u1s1,1 1a1s1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1s1u1p1r1e1m1e1 1w1h1i1t1e1s1 1h1a1v1e1 1p1e1r1p1e1t1u1a1t1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1c1a1l2s1 1f1o1r1 1"1a1-1l1i1t2l1e1-1m1o1r1e1-1d1e1m1o1c1r1a1c1y1"1 1w1i1t1h1i1n1 1V1i1e1t1n1a1m1,1 1w1h1e1r1e1i1n1 1o1u1r1 1V1i1e1t1n1a1m1e1s1e1 1c1o1m1p1a1t1r1i1o1t1s1,1 1h1o1w1e1v1e1r1,1 1h1a1v1e1 1a1l2 1t1o2 1o1f1t1e1n1 1d1e1r1i1d1e1d1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1"1r1e1d1u1n1d1a1n1t1 1d1e1m1o1c1r1a1c1y1"1.1

2L1e1a1v1i1n1g1 1a1s1i1d1e1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1s1o1c1i1a1l1 1c1o1r2u1p1t1s1 1i1n1-1b1e1t1w1e2n1 1t1h1e1 1p1a1n1d1e1m1i1c1,1 1w1e1,1 1i1n1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1l1,1 1h1a1v1e1 1d1o1n1e1 1a1 1p1h1e1n1o1m1e1n1a1l2y1 1g1o2d1 1j1o1b1,1 1f1o1r1a1s1m1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1l1o1c1a1l1 1n1e1w1s1p1a1p1e1r1s1 1a1n1d1 1s1o1c1i1a1l1 1n1e1t1w1o1r1k1s1 1h1a1v1e1 1a1l1o1n1g1s1i1d1e1 1e1v1i1d1e1n1c1e1d1 1o1u1r1 1g1r1a1t1e1f1u1l1,1 1l1a1i1d1-1b1a1c1k1 1m1a1n2e1r1s1,1 1w1h1e1n1 1s1e1t1 1s1i1d1e1 1b1y1 1s1i1d1e1 1w1i1t1h1 1t1h1e1 1r1e1s1t1 1o1f1 1t1h1i1s1 1w1o1r1l1d1.1

2T1o1 1p1u1t1 1i1n1t1o1 1p1e1r1s1p1e1c1t1i1v1e1,1 1h1e1 1a1r1g1u1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1s1o1-1c1a1l2e1d1 1"1p1a1t1i1e1n1t1 1a1u1t1o1n1o1m1y1"1 1d1i1d1 1e1x1e1r1t1 1a1d1v1e1r1s1e1 1i1m1p1a1c1t1s1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1p1a1t1i1e1n1t1s1,1 1i1n1s1t1e1a1d1 1o1f1 1g1i1v1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1m1 1a1 1h1e1l1p1i1n1g1 1h1a1n1d1.1 1T1h1e1 1a1u1t1o1n1o1m1y1,1 1a1c2o1r1d1i1n1g1l1y1,1 1i1s1 1a1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1l1 1c1o1n1v1e1n1t1i1o1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1p1a1t1i1e1n1t1s1 1o1w1n1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1r1i1g1h1t1s1 1t1o1 1p1i1c1k1 1u1p1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1o1w1n1 1t1r1e1a1t1m1e1n1t1 1m1e1t1h1o1d1s1,1 1w1h1i1l1s1t1 1h1e1a1l1t1h1c1a1r1e1 1p1r1o1v1i1d1e1r1s1 1a1r1e1 1t1o1 1m1e1r1e1l1y1 1p1r1o1p1o1s1e1 1t1h1e1 1m1e1t1h1o1d1s1,1 1i1n1s1t1e1a1d1 1o1f1 1e1v1e1r1 1o1p1t1i1n1g1 1f1o1r1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1o1n1 1a1c2o1u1n1t1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1a1t1i1e1n1t1s1.1

2B1a1r2y1 1S1c1h1w1a1r1t1z1,1 1i1n1 1a1 1l1i1k1e1 1m1a1n2e1r1 1t1o1 1u1s1,1 1a1d1m1i1t2e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1s1e1l1f1-1c1o1n1t1r1o1l1 1a1n1d1 1f1r1e2d1o1m1,1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1w1h1o1l1e1,1 1w1e1r1e1 1c1r1u1c1i1a1l1 1t1o1 1o1n1'1s1 1m1e1n1t1a1l1 1h1e1a1l1t1h1 1a1n1d1 1h1a1p2i1n1e1s2.1 1H1e1,1 1h1o1w1e1v1e1r1,1 1a1l1s1o1 1a1s2e1r1t1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1c1h1o1i1c1e1 1r1e1d1u1n1d1a1n1c1y1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1g1e1t1 1h1i1m1 1t1o1 1e1n1d1 1u1p1 1m1i1s1e1r1a1b1l1e1.1

2T1o1 1a1l2 1a1p2e1a1r1a1n1c1e1s1,1 1w1e1 1m1u1s1t1 1c1o1m1e1 1t1o1 1m1a1n1y1 1a1 1d1e1c1i1s1i1o1n1,1 1f1r1o1m1 1w1h1a1t1 1t1o1 1w1e1a1r1 1(1n1o1t1 1c1o1u1n1t1i1n1g1 1u1n1i1f1o1r1m1s1)1,1 1w1h1a1t1 1t1o1 1e1a1t1,1 1a1n1d1 1a1 1w1o1e1f1u1l2y1 1w1i1d1e1 1r1a1n1g1e1 1o1f1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1t1h1i1n1g1s1:1 1p1a1r1t1n1e1r1s1 1p1o1p2i1n1g1 1u1p1 1i1n1q1u1i1r1i1n1g1 1u1s1 1o1f1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1t1o1 1p1i1c1k1 1u1p1,1 1o1r1 1c1o1l2e1a1g1u1e1s1 1a1s1k1i1n1g1 1u1s1 1o1f1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1a1p2r1o1a1c1h1 1t1o1 1s1e1t1 1o1u1t1.1 1N1o1t1 1t1o1 1m1e1n1t1i1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1m1i1n1o1r1 1e1f2o1r1t1l1e1s2,1 1t1h1e1r1e1 1a1r1e1 1a1c1t1u1a1l2y1 1t1a1s1k1s1 1w1h1e1r1e1 1f1r1e2d1o1m1 1a1l1o1n1e1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1g1e1t1 1t1h1e1m1 1s1o1-1m1u1c1h1-1m1o1r1e1-1a1r1d1u1o1u1s1.1
2W1e1,1 1t1h1u1s1,1 1h1a1v1e1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1s1o1 1o1f1t1e1n1 1h1u1r1t1e1d1 1f1o1r1 1s1o1m1e1o1n1e1 1m1a1k1i1n1g1 1d1e1c1i1s1i1o1n1s1 1o1n1 1a1c2o1u1n1t1 1o1f1 1u1s1 1(1t1a1k1e1,1 1f1o1r1 1e1x1a1m1p1l1e1,1 1B1a1t1m1a1n1'1s1 1A1l1f1r1e1d1 1b1u1t1l1e1r1)1.1 1T1h1i1s1 1a1l1s1o1 1r1e1a1s1o1n1s1 1o1u1t1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1c1o1m1p1r1o1m1i1s1e1 1o1f1 1"1w1h1a1t1s1o1e1v1e1r1"1 1a1f1t1e1r1 1d1a1y1s1 1o1f1 1s1l1o1g2i1n1g1 1t1h1r1o1u1g1h1 1c1h1o1i1c1e1s1.1
2A1n1o1t1h1e1r1 1'1m1i1s1e1r1y1'1 1b1e1h1i1n1d1 1s1u1c1h1 1a1 1r1e1d1u1n1d1a1n1c1y1 1o1f1 1c1h1o1i1c1e1 1i1s1 1t1h1e1 1l1e1f1t1-1b1e1h1i1n1d1,1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1i1s1 1a1c1t1u1a1l2y1 1c1r1i1t1i1c1a1l1.1 1T1h1e1 1v1a1r1i1e1t1y1 1o1f1 1w1h1i1c1h1,1 1f1r1o1m1 1d1r1e1s2,1 1f1u1r1n1i1t1u1r1e1,1 1f1a1s1h1i1o1n1 1t1o1 1o1p1t1i1n1g1 1f1o1r1 1p1a1r1t1n1e1r1s1 1a1l1s1o1 1a1r1e1 1c1r1e2p1i1n1g1 1u1p1o1n1 1u1s1,1 1s1t1i1r2i1n1g1 1u1p1 1s1h1a1m1e1,1 1a1n1d1 1u1n1k1n1o1w1n1 1f1e2l1i1n1g1s1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1c1h1o1s1e1n1,1 1a1l1o1n1g1 1w1i1t1h1 1t1h1e1 1l1e1f1t1 1o1u1t1.1
2T1h1e1 1h1u1m1a1n1 1s1o1c1i1e1t1y1,1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1n1e1 1h1a1n1d1,1 1h1a1s1 1o1f2e1r1e1d1 1u1s1 1m1a1n1y1 1a1n1 1o1p1t1i1o1n1,1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1h1a1n1d1,1 1g1e1t2i1n1g1 1u1s1 1t1o1 1e1n1d1 1u1p1 1i1n1 1a1 1s1i1t1u1a1t1i1o1n1,1 1w1h1e1r1e1i1n1 1w1e1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1s1p1a1r1e1 1n1o1 1r1o2m1 1f1o1r1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1o1f1 1w1h1i1c1h1,1 1t1h1u1s1 1s1t1o1r1m1i1n1g1 1u1s1,1 1w1h1o1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1i1n1 1t1u1r1n1 1l1o1n1g1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1'1b1a1r1e1l1y1 1e1n1o1u1g1h1'1 1c1h1o1i1c1e1s1.1

2O1n1 1t1h1e1 1w1h1o1l1e1,1 1i1t1 1s1e2m1s1 1u1n1i1m1p1e1a1c1h1a1b1l1e1 1t1h1a1t1 1f1r1e2d1o1m1 1a1n1d1 1d1e1m1o1c1r1a1c1y1,1 1r1e1g1a1r1d1l1e1s2 1o1f1 1a1n1y1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1,1 1o1w1n1 1t1h1e1 1n1e1v1e1r1-1a1b1s1o1l1u1t1e1 1n1a1t1u1r1e1s1 1b1o1u1n1d1e1d1 1w1i1t1h1i1n1 1c1e1r1t1a1i1n1 1l1i1m1i1t1s1.1 1I1n1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1s1i1m1p1l1i1f1i1e1d1 1w1o1r1d1s1,1 1o1u1r1 1v1e1r1y1 1d1e1s1c1e1n1d1i1n1g1 1u1p1o1n1 1a1 1s1o1c1i1e1t1y1 1i1t1s1e1l1f1 1d1e1p1r1i1v1e1s1 1u1s1 1o1f1 1f1r1e2d1o1m1.1 1T1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1i1n1f1l1a1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1f1r1e2d1o1m1 1l1i1m1i1t1a1t1i1o1n1s1 1w1i1t1h1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1"1a1l2o1w1e1d1"1 1z1o1n1e1s1,1 1t1h1u1s1,1 1d1o1e1s1 1h1a1r1d1l1y1 1s1p1e1l2 1o1u1t1 1w1h1e1t1h1e1r1 1s1o1m1e1t1h1i1n1g1 1i1s1 1s1c1r1u1p1u1l1o1u1s1.1 1E1v1e1r1y1 1s1o1 1o1f1t1e1n1,1 1i1t1 1e1v1e1n1 1b1a1c1k1f1i1r1e1s1.1
